thread.title: Kim Jong Un invites South Korean president to the North

title: Kim Jong Un invites South Korean president to the North
text:
Kim Jong Un invites South Korean president to the North 9:33pm IST - 01:09 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un invited South Korean President Moon Jae-in to Pyongyang “at an early date”, South Korean officials said on Saturday. It could set up the first meeting of Korean leaders in more than 10 years. Grace Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un invited South Korean President Moon Jae-in to Pyongyang “at an early date”, South Korean officials said on Saturday. It could set up the first meeting of Korean leaders in more than 10 years. Grace Lee reports.
